member.name: M:RCIOInitialize(DWORD)
member.summary: This function configures the RC I/O such as digital I/O and relays.
member.param: Specifies the bit mask of the digital out channels. Note: The caller should OR the RC_DIGITAL_* values for this parameter.

member.name: M:RCIOPrintData(void)
member.summary: This function prints the state of the RC I/O.

member.name: M:RCIOPrintDigitalIo(BYTE,BYTE,BYTE,BYTE)
member.summary: This function prints the state of the RC digital IO.
member.param: Specifies input state if the pin is configured as INPUT.
Specifies output state if the pin is configured as OUTPUT.

member.name: M:RCIOPrintRelay(BYTE,BYTE,BYTE)
member.summary: This function prints the state of the RC relay.
member.param: Specifies the Fwd state of the relay.
Specifies the Rev state of the relay.
